response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional item that holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Given its worth to you, I propose a price of $15,000 for this product. I understand that negotiations are part of the process, so let's discuss how we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 15000}
